<Text: Le Port, also known as The Harbor, The Port or simply Marine, is a painting by the French artist Jean Metzinger.>
Triplets:<Le Port

Text: Le Port (painting):  "The Harbor" was subsequently reproduced in "The Cubist Painters, Aesthetic Meditations (Les Peintres cubistes, Méditations Esthétiques)", written by Guillaume Apollinaire, published by Figuière in 1913 (collection Mme L. Ricou).
